channel.title: Can we add these commands to torrc
channel.description:
Earlier I was speaking to another hidden service owner and the person recommended that I add the following to my hiddenservice torrc.
I am not sure if the person is using whonix or not to host their hidden service and I wouldn't ask.
The commands are
HiddenServiceMaxStreams 10 HiddenServiceMaxStreamsCloseCircuit 1 HiddenServiceNumIntroductionPoints 10

item.title: Can we add these commands to torrc
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Thatuglyguy:

Earlier I was speaking to another hidden service owner and the person recommended that I add the following to my hiddenservice torrc.

I would ask the Tor developers and see if this is recommended or will make Whonix users stand out or make some attacks easier.

If you confirm that it doesn’t and it does improve performance, then I don’t see why I couldn’t add it.

Make sure you link your question thread on the Tor mailing list here so I can follow along.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we add these commands to torrc
